data.description: [b]DICTATOR[/b]: 23,100 bonus marching capacity for hero’s squad

JUNGLE DUEL:  (PREP) (Range 1, Target 1)
Ignores 25% of enemy base resistance. For first 3 turns,normal attacks lock onto enemy squad in opposite position and ignores 50% of base resistance. (i.e if Huntress in front row, locks onto front row)

DEFENSIVE FORMATION (DICTATOR)
Hero’s squad has +50% resistance

OFFENSIVE FORMATION (DICTATOR)
Hero’s squad has +50% might

WILD POUNCE (PASSIVE) (Range 5, Target1)
50% chance after normal attack to deal 350% bonus damage to target. 50% chance when bonus damage is triggered to inflict suppression on 1 random enemy for 1 turn.

AWAKEN (DICTATOR)
+15% might and resistance, +15% vehicle damage, +250% dictator skill effect

DEADLY CLAWS (PASSIVE) (Range 5, Target 1)
35% chance after a normal attack to deal 600% bonus damage to the target. Bonus damage is increased to 810% if target squad’s troops are 50% lower than start of battle

Combat, Range 5, 1 Enemy / 1 Friend: Gain 1 stacks of Reflecting Armor Charge each time a friendly squad receives damage. When Reflecting Armor Charge reaches 9 stacks, bestow a Reflecting Barrier to 1 random friendly squad, then clear all stacks and restart the stack count. Each time Reflecting Barrier is activated, there is a 30% chance for it activate again without any Reflecting Armor Charge stacks. (Reflecting Barrier reflects 100% of the next incoming damage back to the attacking enemy, and negates the incoming damage for the friendly party.
